website_summaries.verdict: An exceedingly popular snow boot showcasing supreme weather performance and stylish design.
pros: Zippered pull-down design for ease taking on and off
Textured sole offers supreme grip and functionality
cons: Seams tend to fall apart over time
Arch seems a little too high in the sole

customer_reviews.title: Warm and sturdy. The main problem is that they've been useless ...
customer_reviews.text: Warm and sturdy. The main problem is that they've been useless in the snow -- the snow just clumps up on the bottom and then creates a snow block on the bottom of the boot that my son can't walk on. Four different snows (admittedly wet snows) and it has happened each time. My guess is that the tread is too deep and when the snow packs into the tread the sole is too stiff for a toddler to flex while walking so the snow doesn't break off 'naturally' --- it just builds and builds until there's a snow block. I'm now searching for boots with more shallow tread or a more flexible sole.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: Snow sticks to the bottom.
customer_reviews.text: Others have mentioned snow sticking to the soles so I've added a picture because it's so unusual that it's hard to imagine. These compressed snow balls develop in a couple of minutes and the kid starts asking for a hand just to help with walking.
customer_reviews.author: drdr

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying these shoes are hot garbage. As far as look and fit, they work like a charm, my 4 year old with a size 10 foot, can fit these with no struggle and they cover a decent of part if his leg to protect from rain and snow. But when it comes to playing in the snow, forget about it. As you can see from my pictures, they are not durable. Mind you, these pictures are from the FIRST time he wore them in the snow and it's as almost like they melted.....literally. I would not recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: BJ1517

customer_reviews.title: Snow Buildup
customer_reviews.text: I’d love to give these boots five stars, but can’t for one reason. They work very very well for keeping little feet warm and dry. After at least an hour out in the snow, my 3-year-old’s feet were still toasty warm. I thought the deep tread on these boots would be a good thing. The problem is that the snow builds up on the bottoms and makes it extremely hard for her to walk around. I had to scrape the bottoms of the boots after about every 2 minutes of walking around. This was the first time she wore them, though, and I’m hoping that once the rubber gets a bit worn, the snow buildup problem will go away.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen P.

customer_reviews.title: No traction and brutally slippery
customer_reviews.text: The sole is ridiculously slippery and has no traction. My 3 year old could not stay upright in the garage or mud room or any surface other than the actual snow outside. They’re warm and work in the snow, but I had to carry my 3 year old to the snow and then back from the snow.
customer_reviews.author: J Foster

customer_reviews.title: Daughter's favorite shoes; never worn in snow
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review after purchasing my second pair of these boots (the first pair were outgrown). Neither pair have been worn in snow, so I cannot speak to that aspect. Unusually warm weather on our vacation meant no snow to test them out on, and it does not snow where I live. That said, my daughter absolutely loves these boots. They're her go-to pair no matter the weather or location we go to. She finds them very easy to put on, and enjoys the "clomp" sound they make on hard floors. They are very effective on rainy days in keeping her feet dry and snug and warm.
customer_reviews.author: K. Andrea

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My son alternated between these and another pair of boots for daily use in the snow for 2 weeks. He never complained. They were pretty easy to get on/off. They dried out in a reasonable amount of time. When the deck was icy and slippery he couldn’t slide in the boots (although he was trying!!). I would definitely buy this brand again when he outgrows this pair. This was also the brand that was being sold in the children’s store in Truckee, a very snowy town.
customer_reviews.author: ChristerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: They run small
customer_reviews.text: I got these today and am on the fence about keeping them. They're not too small but they're alreadt bordering on it and we don't even have snow yet. Definitely not as roomy as a 2 should normally be on my petite 9 year old girl. quality wise they do seem to be of excellent construction. I would advise to order a size up from even what you think you need for wiggle room. For example my daughter wears 1-1.5 in sneakers so I got 2 but wished I got 3.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Cover

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic boot!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this boot!!! It can withstand cold -40 + degrees below zero. Very warm. Zips up for easy access. Water proof, ice proof. Fits a little big but with thick socks it's just right. Very heavy and grips to ice and snow with ease. My daughter is still able to wear this book for 1 more year and then i will definitely be buying another pair for winter 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too small
customer_reviews.text: Really cute boots, cuter than the picture..but fit too small. I even ordered up a bit to ensure they could be worn with comfortable, thick socks but they were too tight, already, upon arrival. My daughter could barely get it on with a thin summer sock on. They seem narrow and very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Hainstock

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I like the boots a lot and so does my daughter. They are very well made, durable and will keep my daughter's feet warm and dry. She's walked and play in the snow with 20 degrees and her feet have stayed totally dry and warm. The color and design is beautiful! Also, they are not heavy (2 of my other girls have Tundra boots which I also like a lot, but they complaint about how heavy they are, but my 2 girls that wear Northside don't find them heavy) They are easy to put on and off. I totally recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, look nice, and good quality. After reading many reviews, I went with these and am happy. Definitely buy a size up; they run a bit small, they are winterer boots which requires thicker socks, and you want to use them for more than one season! They are good enough in quality that we will get 2 seasons and pass down to our nephew for 2 seasons. With the price and will but this brand again next time around.
customer_reviews.author: Mdelong

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler waterproof boot!
customer_reviews.text: I had a very difficult time finding snow boots in toddler 6 for girls. (Lots of fashion boots out there but of course not waterproof.) I ordered these out of desperation, just hoping they would fit my daughter and work for the winter season. They are truly great! The zipper in front makes them easy to put on. The material is great for keeping her feet dry. They come well above the ankle to provide extra protection. She wears them and is able to run and play in them with no problem! Ordered her true size, and they fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M.

customer_reviews.title: Snow kept getting caked on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how but the snow sticks to the bottom of these boots so much that it makes it almost impossible for my son to walk in them in the snow. It happened almost every time he wore them this winter (and we got a lot of snow days!), after a few steps he would have so much snow caked on the bottom it was like he was trying to walk on stilts. I'd chisel the snow off of the bottoms and then within a few steps it would be caked on again. They fit well and were easy enough to get on but we had to stop using them due to this issue.
customer_reviews.author: E Reads

customer_reviews.title: STOP SCROLLING THROUGH BOOTS! !
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE AFTER PUDDLES: My son has been using these a ton and recently we got a bunch of rain and snow. My son was jumping in the puddles in water deep enough to rise above the rubber sole and his feet were still dry!! These are great! I know how hard it is to buy things like this online. I looked at page after page. I finally just had to pick. These are great. My son plays outside & when he comes in his feet are warm & dry still.
customer_reviews.author: Humble & HonestTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my girls feet dry, warm and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her boots. They keep her feet warm, dry and she loves how comfortable they are. They are holding up great for this winter season which is great as my six year old loves the snow and if she is not in it at home she is at school. They also wash up beautifully when any dirt gets stuck on them. I am very happy with these boots and I did buy it a size up, my daughter is size 1 in shoes so I always go a size up for boots and she has a bit of room still to grow in them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good so far...
customer_reviews.text: My son needs a size 3 but they were not available so I got a 4. Of course they're too big but not so big he can't wear them as long as he's mindful so they don't slip off and break his ankle I went with these in a 4 knowing they'd be a bit large because they're one of the only ones in this price range that zip up rather than have that stupid bungee thingy. My hope is he will get at least 2 winters out of them b4 needing a larger size. He says they're comfy and warm...Probably waterproof but haven't tried them in crappy weather yet. I wish they had all the sizes available
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Burke

customer_reviews.title: Not a comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Boots seemed like they were ok quality but both my kids said they were way too tight where the rubber meets the fabric. They hurt to wear and after a couple minutes already looked to be causing blisters. My kids have pretty slim feet too.
customer_reviews.author: ReadRunPray

customer_reviews.title: Not quite right
customer_reviews.text: They are really nice boots. They look exactly like the picture. They are really heavy and warm. My daughter loves them. My only problem with them is that the snow and ice cake up under the center of the boot causing my daughter to not be able to walk right after a while. It would cause her to fall if I didn't stay on top if it and keep knocking the snow off. That us my only complaint, but that's a fairly big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Warm and sturdy but the shape of the sole is a problem
customer_reviews.text: Warm, comfortable, good tread/traction, and easy for my three-year-old to put on and take on herself. However, there's a really high arch in the sole that collects packed snow like crazy. After a walk through the snow the bottom of the boots is basically a slick round ball from all the snow that has collected there, and she falls down if she tries to walk on a flat surface. This has happened in every kind of snow (dry/powdery, wet, etc.) and it hasn't happened with any other pair of snow boots she has had, so I think it's a flaw in the design.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good only to -25 F
customer_reviews.text: Info on tag states -25 Fahrenheit as coldest temp for these boots. Fairbanks always has colder winter temps. Would not have ordered if that info had been available when ordering. My grandson will need to add wool socks for many winter days. Local purchase only in our future.
customer_reviews.author: GypsyWeaver

customer_reviews.title: Good Pair of Snowboots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 8 year old son who is extremely hard on everything. So far they have help up very well, though he's only worn them a handful of times. He's had previous snowboots with velcro fronts, but these have the zipper and are so much better. For the price, I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Right size, but hard to get on
customer_reviews.text: I said somewhat small because the area where the fabric meets the rubber boot part was very tight. It was hard to get on and off of him. Length is perfect, so correct size but you can't avoid that area when putting on. My grandson doesn't have fat feet , very normal, but it was hard to get these on him and had he not needed to wear them in the snow, he would have taken them off. However once his foot made it past that part, they were comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: smitty

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: These boots appear perfect for the snow, but when worn in the snow (Like many other reviews here) The snow sticks to the bottom of the boot! My toddler has almost twisted his ankle and has fallen multiple times due to this. It is dangerous. NORTHSIDE- The tread on the bottom of the boot is horrible!!! Please invest in a new design or you will continue to get poor reviews! I wish I could get my money back- but these were purchased prior to snow fall and too much time had passed.
customer_reviews.author: N. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 1 year old. They arrived fairly quickly and in good condition. They are really cute and seem like they'll be warm. Only downside is the zipper is on the front and doesn't go down all the way so getting the shoes on is a bit difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Inches of snow sticks to bottom of boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots are decent for my toddler in the snow except for one thing. The snow clumps on the bottom of her foot and it really impedes her walking. So much snow that sometimes there's 3" on there. And we have to continually try to knock it off for her. She has worn these in the snow on many occasions and we thought maybe they'd stop doing it. Maybe it was because she was so light. Nope. My younger nephew's boots didn't do this. No one else's boots do this. It's just sad to watch. These boots come with a major flaw. I would like a refund and I would never buy this product ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy, work great
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy snow shoes that I bought for my daughter. They were true to size (I bought the same size as her current tennis shoe.) They are sturdy, waterproof, and she wears them willingly so they must be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my 9 year old son for a trip to my dad's house. He wore them for several hours of playing in the snow and his feet stayed warm and dry. I bought a size larger than he normally wears, hoping he would be able to use them a bit longer, but they aren't too big, so they may run a little on the smaller side. Very happy with these overall.
customer_reviews.author: Coop816

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us this time
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this 3 stars not because it's a bad boot (this is what my daughter had the last 2 years and they were great) but because even going 2 sizes up from last years boot, my daughter could not even get her foot in them. Also, we received a pair that had obviously been worn outside as the soles had rocks in them and the inside had sighs of wear also. They were still in good shape but again didn't fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Was hard to get on and was on the smaller side. I think  the difficulty was because of the ankle portion
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the food itself seems pretty good. However, I ordered one size bigger than my toddler's foot size and the fit is somewhat small so... I was barely able to get his foot in, and it wasn't easy. So I think he'll be able to wear it once but that might be the only time he'll be able to wear it... The next time we go to the snow he may need a new pair of shoes already, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: CHintz

customer_reviews.title: Happy With Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These boots kept the kids feet warm and dry. They are easy to put on and are excellent quality. The kids found them comfortable to wear and move around in. I would purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: SeriouslyHappy

customer_reviews.title: nice boots
customer_reviews.text: durable. we like this brand, my daughter has had hers for two years going strong and playing hard in them. ordered this pair for my son, he likes that they don't have liners that come out, easy on, easy off. zipper keeps them from coming off in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great warm boots
customer_reviews.text: I was sort of hesitate after reading some of the reviews. These boots are great. They are made well and have a really warm, soft inside to the boot. 200gram Thinsulate boots perfect for our freezing Wisconsin winters. The liners do not come out which makes it easier for my 5 year old to take on and off herself. I would definitely buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: jend

customer_reviews.title: Love that these boots are rated to -30 F
customer_reviews.text: Love that these boots are rated to -30 F! They seem to fit a little small. I got size 1 for my child who wears 13.5 and they fit on the dot. She likes the lining and design.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Snow gets inside the boots
customer_reviews.text: This boot is useless in the snow. Because it opens wide, every time my daughter would slide on the snow, a bunch of snow would get in. Her socks were soaked and made her feet very cold. Get a boot that ties and prevents the snow from getting inside. Too late to return now but I regret the buy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but run 2 sizes small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up for my daughter who is a size 3 big kid in sneakers. These boots would have been fine I’m sure if they had fit. They run at least 2 sizes small. Ended up giving them to a friend and buying boots locally.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Thibodeau

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw possibly??
customer_reviews.text: My 7th grader had a very difficult time sliding his foot into this which is weird as I ordered his current size and 1 size up. Neither worked at all. We ordered a different boot by same manufacturer "Northside Kids Frosty" and the size up in that fits beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: H. Krech

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 8 yo!
customer_reviews.text: These are great snow boots. So durable and comfortable. The easy zip make it a breeze to put on immediately for a snow ball fight. The fleece lined boot is warm and insulated. The soles are great and non slip too! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie M.

customer_reviews.title: Not red. Very pink.
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I expected for the price. My daughter loves them. They are definitely more pink than red.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and 2 other pairs from other brands that also rated highly on Amazon. My son picked this pair. Lighter weight, less bulky, easy zipper. And I like the costs. So everyone wins. They are warm. Definitely waterproof. My son climbed on snow and walked in muddy snow and no wet feet.
customer_reviews.author: NaN

customer_reviews.title: Affordable. Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Solid stitching. Boot construction held up running, playing, stomping around in the snow from my 7 year old. His feet stayed dry and warm. They’re easy to get on. They don’t shift in the area of support.
customer_reviews.author: Meri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Alaska winters!
customer_reviews.text: These boots look great and my almost 4 year old loves them. We are from Alaska so we get some cold winters. I'm happy they zip in the front for better protection instead of the drawstring at the top that a lot of kids boots seems to have.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boots ...... Order Bigger Size
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice boots but are hard to get on. I ordered a size bigger and still are difficult for child to get on. Once on they are okay. Wish I would've ordered 2 sizes bigger. It seems like the opening to put your foot in is too small. Otherwise .... Like the boots. Good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Boot broke after 2 wears
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore these boots twice and they broke. The arched stitching above the rubber toe came completely undone and the zipper split. I bought them because my son had a good experience with Northside in the past, so I know it probably wouldn't happen to every boot. Frustrating nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Moore

customer_reviews.title: Felt On Bottom
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t read reviews so I guess this is my fault but the boots have felt glued to the bottom and snow just collects on the felt making it pretty much impossible for my toddler to walk in the snow. These would be great for ice only, but absolutely terrible for any snow.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Harrison

customer_reviews.title: These boots seem to be really great quality. We just need some snow to really ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots seem to be really great quality. We just need some snow to really test them out! The kids were able to play outside for a couple of hours and not complain about cold feet. That's a plus. The only think I don't like about them is the fabric behind the zipper tends to get stuck in the zipper if your are not careful. Not really a big problem for me at least not enough to prevent future purchases. But I can see kids having a problem remembering to push the fabric back out of the way and getting the zipper stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Jed Anderson

customer_reviews.title: These were the equivalent of a Walmart Special. My ...
customer_reviews.text: These were the equivalent of a Walmart Special. My son wears a size 11 toddler and when they arrived I was shocked to see that the 13 would probably not last us through the winter. They are cheaply made and I have a hard time believing that these thin things without a removable liner would keep my child's feet warm in a Wisconsin Winter. I will never know as I returned them as soon as I took them out and saw size and how they were made!
customer_reviews.author: Amc123

customer_reviews.title: Order up!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality boots; wasn't sure with ordering online even with reading reviews. My son wears a 3.5 shoe currently and based on reviews, we ordered up (size 5), however his toes were right at the end of the boot! Exchanging for a size 6, which is crazy considering he wears more than 2 sizes smaller than this. Hopefully the size 6 fits better!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P.

customer_reviews.title: Snow Boots
customer_reviews.text: We needed snow boots for all our adventures and these were just what we needed. Not only did they keep the littles feet warm but also comfortable. These are as described and true to fit.
customer_reviews.author: MoMo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: The boots are solid construction and extremely warm. My grandkids love them and especially love how warm their feet stay...and their feet do not get wet at all!!! Amazing boots! Was worried about purchasing them without being able to "touch" them, but made the right choice by going ahead after reading their feedback. Super happy with our purchase of boots for all our grandkids. Super fast shipping and super great quality! I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Leatrice

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter. She loves them. Says they are very comfortable. I like how they look. They are way nicer than the pics show.
customer_reviews.author: P. manley

customer_reviews.title: Good Boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots were a steal for what we got. My daughter has used them for over a year and they are still perfect. They fit just like they should.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Easy for kids to put on and take off, and that makes all the difference
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 11 year old, who hates snow boots that are hard to get on and off. He loves these and wears them every day. The zippers make all the difference. The boots fit as expected, and are both warm and waterproof. They're exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: M. Landau

customer_reviews.title: Great price and had the size I needed!
customer_reviews.text: My sons feet have grown two sizes since last winter and I had a difficult time finding boots for a big boys 7 in the stores! They were all men's 7s and way too expensive to buy a kid with feet growing way too fast! Luckily I found these on Amazon and decided to give them a try. They fit perfectly and will be good for the season! The best part is they didn't cost me a fortune!
customer_reviews.author: M. Brun

customer_reviews.title: Zipper jams.
customer_reviews.text: Zipper appears to be cheap and does not operate smoothly. Behind the zipper is a thin nylon fabric gusset designed to make boot waterproof. The material gets caught in the zipper and jams the zipper. Pliers, strong fingers, and a great deal of patience are required to unjam the zipper. Cheap zippers should be illegal.
customer_reviews.author: thomas p mccown

customer_reviews.title: High quality, keeps feet warm.
customer_reviews.text: Gave these boots to my 5 year old grandson. The zipper is perfect for helping him put on and take off. He said they keep his feet very warm in the 20 degree weather we have had in the past week. Would definitely purchase this name brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Mulnix

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our daughter for Christmas and we finally had some snow she could wear them. She said they are the best
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie E.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality at a fraction of what I expected
customer_reviews.text: These boots held up all winter! They fit true to size and kept my daughters feet warm even in negative temps. They showed little to no wear after a whole season of daily use on a very active kid. They arrived right on time and were well worth the money!! Ihave purchased much more expensive boys that were far more disappointing than these. I will be purchasing these again next winter season for all 3 of my kids this time around!
customer_reviews.author: mnmama88

customer_reviews.title: If you live in an area with a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: If you live in an area with a lot of snow, the snow tends to pack into snowballs into the soles of the boots. It's hard for little kids to kick the snow off the boots and therefore hard to walk in these boots.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied! Quality for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Northside boots for my son last year based on reviews and price. He and I both loved them so I purchased a pair of these for each of my kids (ages 3 & 5) this year. I chose the zip up ones so that they would be able to get them on themselves. They go to a daycare center where they staff likes the kids to be able to dress themselves. The zipper works well enough for the kids to pull it up themselves and is strong enough to stay up while being worn. The boot itself is durable and warm. I will continue to purchase Norhtside boots in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Northside boots for my son last year based on reviews and price. He and I both loved them so I purchased a pair of these for each of my kids (ages 3 & 5) this year. I chose the zip up ones so that they would be able to get them on themselves. They go to a daycare center where they staff likes the kids to be able to dress themselves. The zipper works well enough for the kids to pull it up themselves and is strong enough to stay up while being worn. The boot itself is durable and warm. I will continue to purchase Norhtside boots in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Two days after I received these boots we had an ...
customer_reviews.text: Two days after I received these boots we had an ice +rain storm roll through with 4 inches of rain in a short time. Everything was damp, muddy, and frigid with 30 degree temperature. My daughter ran outside, splashed in deep puddles, ran through slush for over an hour at a time and never once did her feet get cold or wet. I'm so impressed that I want a pair in my size!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Very cool boots
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 6 year old. I bought size 1. The zipper in the front makes it easy for her to put them on. She loved the color. They kept her feet warm and dry while playing in the snow! She has since used them in the rain too and they kept her feet completely dry! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: Sent back
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for both of my kids as they had this brand and style in past years. Something must have changed because the snow clumped up so bad they couldn't walk. When we got home from our ruined tubing excursion we noticed fibers were coming out of the sole. Sent back!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Willenbring

customer_reviews.title: Really great toddler boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these based on others' recommendations here so I owe it to the next person to add my own. Our 2-year-old toddler LOVES clomping around in these and they really do seem to keep her feet warm here in very cold Wisconsin. She wears a size 6, maybe 6.5 shoe at the most, and the 6 was much too hard for her to get on (she threw them across the room). But she can step right into the 7 on her own, so I recommend (as others have) buying a size up. These are a really terrific purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LHC

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT stay dry!
customer_reviews.text: Stays pretty dry inside. Very easy to get on with the zipper opening. My 7 yr old says he loves the way they fit. Changing rating to 2 stars. These boots just do not keep my son's feet dry. At all. They are the wettest boots we own. Just bought a pair of North Face for another son and his feet were the ONLY part of his entire body that stayed dry! For a snowy climate, I need to put these aside for back-up and go invest in a better boot. My son deserves not to have socks so wet you can wring them out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: These boots are nice but a huge complaint I have is how they collect snow on the bottom. No matter what kind of snow (fluffy or sticky), when my daughter walks around the snow sticks to the bottom of the boot and it’s like she’s wearing platform shoes. It puts her off balance and she has to constantly bang the snow off her shoes to be able to walk around.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Would be a 5 star but there is no grip. My child fell in the store because no grip on tile. But easy to put on and off and are warm and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: wendy cribbs

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, we put them on him when they arrived for fit. He seemed to be able to walk around in them just fine. I ordered an 8 even though he measured a 7.5. I'm glad I did that. Boots need to be roomy. However, WE NEVER ENDED UP NEEDING THEM. Instead I should have bought him rain boots. We had more thunderstorms this Chicago winter than snow days. That's global warming for you.
customer_reviews.author: Drug Waitress, RNTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My son loved these boots this winter
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these boots this winter. He only wished it snowed more so he could wear them much more!!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce and Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for the weather
customer_reviews.text: Replacement boots for last year's snow boots. Great for playing in the snow, easy on and easy off with the zipper in the front. These boots are durable, and the GBaby loves them. Reasonable price. Great boots would buy again. Would recommend to others. Received notification that the delivery would be delayed due to weather but received them on time. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Winebrenner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: As for the boot itself, it looked ok. However, I ordered a youth size 3 and they sent a size 13 in a box that said size 3. I sent them back and decided to order a cuter more comfortable looking pair from Lands End for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: The kids loved them. Easy to put on and off and ...
customer_reviews.text: I read previous comments about the boot running small so I bout one size up and it fit well. The kids loved them. Easy to put on and off and keep there feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots overall. This is our second year ordering these. My boys like the way they fit and feel, liners that don't come out, they hold up well, and don't break the bank. Only complaint is that with this pair, one of the zippers doesn't work very well. I would have exchanged except we live in the Midwest and needed them immediately for the snowfall we had just received.
customer_reviews.author: Amber F

customer_reviews.title: Buy them
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 6 year old great! Zipper never falls, heavy duty rubber, keeps feet warm and dry, we Live in. MN and the winter here has been long, will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Good little boots.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 4 year old. He likes them and they keep his feet warm. Good boots for the price. They were the green camo ones, so they were a bit less then the other styles.
customer_reviews.author: Nicollbie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy toddler boots
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a very strudy little boot, could be snug on some kids, but my daughter has small feet, and if you take out one insole it makes a huge amount of room. She's osessed:(+_+), wants to wear them everywhere. Well worth $20
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive boots
customer_reviews.text: Toddler loved these boots. He had never worn boots before so we were very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: I ordered big, a size 2, my daughter wears a size 1 right now but as most kids she is growing like crazy. I did take a candle to the zipper to make it easier for her to pull it up and down. She really doesn't need to unzip them as the opening is plenty big enough for her to just pull the boot up over her heel and ankle but she likes to tuck her pants in and, well, has a little OCD like Mom. They are great quality and as long as she doesn't out grow them I'm sure they will last for multiple winters. These boots will live a great life up here in Alaska.
customer_reviews.author: Karma Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty boots perfect for heavy duty kids! They are a bit heavy and clunky (like most snow boots) but they are warm and waterproof. We had some last year and I had to get these in her size this year because we love them! Also last years pair looks brand new after all of the sledding and general use.
customer_reviews.author: Audreanna

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler boot!
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. Kept my little ones feet dry. Fit to size and were easy to get on and off with the zipper down the front. Only thing I did not like is that they were a little heavy for my little one. She handled them well, but would have been nicer/more comfortable had they weighed a little less. Overall great product though.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Snow built up so badly on the bottom of the boot
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst boots have ever seen they look great but the first snowfall and the snow built up so much on the bottom of the boot that neither of my children could even walk I wish I could get a hold of the seller for a total refund
customer_reviews.author: Megan Swanson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband after searching for months for a good pair of shoes. He absolutely love's them! They're great quality, comfortable for long wear and water proof! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lucas & Erica

customer_reviews.title: Boot
customer_reviews.text: Had to return . They did look and feel like a nice boot. No hassle return.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Over Insulated.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter, but they were so insulated that they actually didn't fit. I recommend buying in a larger size if you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna A. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: So I'm mostly satisfied for that price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 4 for my 6 year old but was too small. Got a size 6 and it fits with room to grow. The zippers don't really work. They get stuck halfway down. Zipper seems cheaply made. But it will keep my son'S feet warm in the snow. So I'm mostly satisfied for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Always wet on inside
customer_reviews.text: Without the top half being waterproof, they are always soaked on the inside after the way my kid places in the snow. He even wears his snow pants so the inner lining is in his boot and the outer snow pants are on the outside of his boot. It could just be the way he plays but he does not have this problem when he wears his sisters neoprene boots.
customer_reviews.author: new kindle owner

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with these - ran a little big even with a thicker sock, but good for next year
customer_reviews.author: BSNF

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them, says they keep his feet warm and dry even after playing out in the snow for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Wrs46

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with delivery time and the quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with delivery time and the quality of the product. My daughter is pretty hard on her clothes, but after repeated washings it still fits well and looks great. I would definitely purchase from this company again. There handle the wear and tear of being boots for toddlers very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: i usually wear a 6 in kids shoes but these seem to run rather small i gave them to my aunt shes a 5.5 in kids and they fit her just fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are easy for him to take out them on and take ...
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yo opened the box and was able to try them on by himself thanks to the zipper! They are warm for him and he loves wearing them! They are easy for him to take out them on and take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: they seemed to be of good quality and warm enough for our very cold winters
customer_reviews.text: My son has, what I believe to be, average side/width feet. The boots were too small for him even though we went up one size from his current sneaker. His foot sort of got “stuck” where the long top part of the boot comes down to the main foot area. Couldn’t loosen it and this never got on his feet. So we returned them. I did give them two stars because had they fit, they seemed to be of good quality and warm enough for our very cold winters.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Mori

customer_reviews.title: Snow packs onto soles of boots.
customer_reviews.text: These are fine for keeping warm in cold weather, but were awful in the snow. Snow would just pack onto the bottom of the boots with every step. My son would have to knock the snow off every 10 steps. He said it felt like he was walking in high heels. Also made the boots extremely slippery on any surface other than dirt/snow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice snow boot for the price
customer_reviews.text: The boots arrived on time. I did not realize my grandson’s snow boots were too small for our first snow storm. These were great for the second snow storm of the season. They are an easy on and off with the front zipper and were great with keeping his feet warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and they are a perfect fit! I went a size up from regular shoe size since he will wear them with thick socks. The design is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots
customer_reviews.text: They came a little bit big but i got them with the intention of extra socks and room for growth so they look perfect.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots and prompt delivery for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. Her favorite boots wore holes through three soles. We'll see how these hold up.
customer_reviews.author: babymama

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and easy to get on!
customer_reviews.text: The zipper in front makes the boot easy to get on and off. My 10 year old said this is his most favorite pair of boots ever.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: These are great. My oldest is normally a 9
customer_reviews.text: Finding decently priced kids boots that zip up is practically impossible! These are great. My oldest is normally a 9.5W and the 11 leaves plenty of room for warm socks and even some growth over the winter.
customer_reviews.author: CTshopper

product_meta.title: Northside Icicle Snow Boot
product_meta.description: Rock-solid fashions for the family on the go. Whether it's cold-weather boots or rugged sandals, Northside is all about keeping families moving. The products are built to withstand what today's active families throw at them, or on them. Available in the latest styles, materials and colors, these shoes offer flattering silhouettes with great features like quick-draw lacing, toe guards and traction soles. In fact, Northside all-season footwear offers the features of higher-priced brands, without the high price tag. Finally, there's family footwear to get excited about.
feature_bullets: Upper- 420D Nylon upper with gusseted full zip front closure and reflective strip on back of boot for added safety
Lined with soft Berber nylon to provide warmth and added comfort
Insulated with 200 grams of Thermolite insulation that provides a -25 rating
Removable EVA insole with sherpa lining for added warmth and comfort under foot
